item.title: Trump’s Moves on Greenland Appear to Be Backfiring
item.description: The Greenlandic government is calling an upcoming visit by Trump officials “aggressive,” pushing the island further from the United States.

item.title: Trump Did What Castros Couldn’t: Take Radio Martí Off the Air
item.description: For four decades, a U.S.-financed broadcaster provoked the ire of the communist government in Cuba. President Trump dismantled it in a matter of days.

item.title: Lessons from a Lost-Pet Detective Named Kat
item.description: Recovering missing animals requires understanding both animal and human behavior.
